speaker: Doctor
text: I see you're on metformin for your diabetes. How have your blood sugar levels been?

speaker: Patient
text: They've been a bit high in the mornings.

speaker: Doctor
text: We could add a GLP-1 receptor agonist to help with that. It can also aid in weight loss.

speaker: Patient
text: That sounds promising. Are there any side effects I should be aware of?

speaker: Doctor
text: Some people experience nausea, but it often improves over time.
